title: Pulp Fiction
plot: The lives of two mob hit men, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption

title: Forrest Gump
plot: Forrest Gump, a man with a low I.Q., joins the army for service where he meets Dan and Bubba. However, he cannot stop thinking about his childhood sweetheart Jenny Curran, whose life is messed up.

plot: Princess Leia is kidnapped by the sinister Darth Vader. It is now up to Luke Skywalker, an adventurous farm boy and the rebel forces to rescue her and save the Empire.

plot: William Wallace, a Scottish rebel, sets out to battle an English tyrant who killed his wife a day after their marriage.

plot: A future terminator is set on a mission to kill Sarah's son, John Connor. A cyborg, who once was after the life of Sarah, has been assigned to protect both mother and the son.

Having observed him, they give the name Dances With Wolves. Soon he is a welcomed member of the tribe and falls in love with a white woman who has been raised in the tribe. Tragedy results when Union soldiers arrive with designs on the land.â€?Â More

plot: Detective McClane finds himself in a fix when a man named Simon threatens him to play an odd game, failing which Simon would explode bombs in New York.

plot: Commodus takes over power and demotes Maximus, one of the preferred generals of his father and predecessor, Emperor Marcus Aurelius. Maximus is relegated to fighting till death as a gladiator.

plot: Batman must stop Two-Face who seeks revenge from him after a courtroom accident leaves him disfigured on one side and The Riddler who wants to drain information from all the brains in Gotham.

plot: An alien is left behind on Earth and is saved by young Elliot who decides to keep him hidden. While the task force hunts for it, Elliot and his siblings form an emotional bond with their new friend.

plot: Ben and Jo are storm chasers who have to put their impending divorce on hold to battle a series of violent tornadoes that are destroying Oklahoma.

title: Babe
plot: A piglet befriends a sheepdog, Fly, and with her help decides to learn how to herd sheep.

title: Titanic
plot: Seventeen-year-old Rose hails from an aristocratic family and is set to be married. When she boards the Titanic, she meets Jack Dawson, an artist, and falls in love with him.

plot: Phil is a nasty, self-centered weatherman who is forced to relive one strange day over and over again. What will Phil do to make things go right for him?

plot: Shrek, an ogre, embarks on a journey with a donkey to rescue Princess Fiona from a vile lord and regain his swamp.

title: Stargate
plot: In modern-day Egypt, professor Daniel Jackson (James Spader) teams up with retired Army Col. Now, in order to escape from their intergalactic purgatory, Jackson and O'Neil must convince the planet's people that Ra must be overthrown.â€?Â More

plot: The former Fellowship of the Ring prepare for the final battle. While Frodo and Sam approach Mount Doom to destroy the One Ring, they follow Gollum, unaware of the path he is leading them to.

plot: When archaeologist Indiana Jones learns that his father has disappeared while looking for the Holy Grail, he sets out to search for his father.

plot: The crew of a commercial spacecraft finds itself in danger when they discover a signal from an alien spacecraft. To their horror, they are attacked by an alien creature.

plot: Deckard (Harrison Ford) is forced by the police Boss (M. Emmet Walsh) to continue his old job as Replicant Hunter. His assignment: eliminate four escaped Replicants from the colonies who have returned to Earth. Before starting the job, Deckard goes to the Tyrell Corporation and he meets Rachel (Sean Young), a Replicant girl he falls in love with.â€?Â More

title: Memento
plot: A man, suffering from short-term memory loss, uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.   Stars: Guy Pearce

title: Die Hard
plot: Just as Detective McClane lands in LA to spend Christmas with his wife, he learns about a hostage situation in an office building. Hans Gruber is the culprit and McClane's wife is one of the hostages.

plot: In order to escape the prison labour, McMurphy, a prisoner, fakes insanity and is shifted to the special ward for the mentally unstable. In this ward, he must rise up against a cruel nurse, Ratched.

plot: Two Jedi Knights set out to search for someone who can bring peace to the Force. Their search ends when they come across a young, gifted boy. But the Sith returns to stake claim to the Force.

plot: Jack Ryan uncovers an illegal operation against drug cartels within the CIA. Caught in a web of conspiracies, he must now risk his life and his career in order to bring the perpetrators to justice.

plot: Sam and Molly love each other, but their romance is short-lived when Sam is killed by a thug. Unable to tell Molly that her life is in danger, Sam's spirit takes help of a psychic.

plot: Agent 007, along with Natalia Simonav, travels to Russia to locate the satellite nuclear weapon stolen by Alec, a former agent, who Bond believed was dead.

plot: Realising that Sam has still not come to terms with his wife Maggie's death, his eight-year-old son Jonah forces him to call a national radio talk show, with the hopes of finding him a companion.

plot: Eight-year-old Kevin is accidentally left behind when his family leaves for France. At first, he's happy to be in charge; but when thieves try to break into his home, he puts up a fight like no other.

title: Willy Wonka & the Chocolate Factory
plot: Willy Wonka is a character in Roald Dahl's 1964 children's novel Charlie and the Chocolate Factory, its sequel Charlie and the Great Glass Elevator, and the film adaptations of these books that followed. Wikipedia

title: Good Will Hunting
plot: Will Hunting, a genius in mathematics, is able to solve all the difficult mathematical problems. He takes the help of a psychiatrist to lead a better lifestyle.

title: Waterworld
plot: A mysterious wanderer named the 'Mariner' rescues a woman and her adopted daughter from harm and they embark on a quest that could save mankind.

plot: Charles, a good-natured young introvert, tries to discover his true love for Carrie as he attends the wedding of four of his friends and a funeral.

plot: A cab driver in the 23rd century finds himself battling an evil force during an apocalyptic war as he tries to secure a mysterious "fifth element", as only the fifth element can stop the evil force.

plot: After the death of his wife and daughter, Spanish lord Louis is turned into a vampire by Lestat de Lioncourt. To keep Louis by his side, Lestat converts a plague-ridden girl.

plot: Michael, Vito Corleone's son, attempts to expand his family's crime empire. While he strikes a business deal with gangster Hyman Roth, he is unaware of the dangers he has gotten himself into.

plot: Ellen Ripley is sent back to the planet LV-426 to establish contact with a terraforming colony. She has no choice but to face the deadly Alien Queen and her offspring on this planet.

plot: A puppeteer takes up a job to support his family. While working late one night, he finds a portal that leads directly to the head of the Hollywood actor John Malkovich.

title: X-Men
plot: Two mutants find themselves torn between two conflicting groups that have contrasting ideologies with regard to the development of the mutant kind.

title: L.A. Confidential
plot: Three cops with different agendas investigate a murder case with links to corruption in the police force.

title: Goodfellas
plot: Based on a true story, the plot revolves around Henry and his two unstable friends Jimmy and Tommy as they gradually climb the ladder from petty crime to violent murders.

plot: Cher is a rich high-school student who is learning to cope with adolescence and its problems. She also helps a new student gain popularity and in the process discovers her own feelings.

plot: A blacksmith joins forces with Captain Jack Sparrow, a pirate, in a bid to free the love of his life from Jack's associates.

plot: When a mysterious monolith, which is linked to human evolution, is found, a team of scientists and pilots go on a mission to Jupiter, assisted by their ship's sentient computer HAL 9000.

plot: Dr. Evil uses a 'Time Machine' to travel back to 1969 and remove Austin Powers' mojo. The hapless swinger too travels back in time and, with the help of agent Felicity Shagwell, recovers his vitality.

title: Casablanca
plot: Classic film set in unoccupied Africa during the early days of World War II: An American expatriate meets a former lover, with unforeseen complications.

title: Amelie
plot: Amelie, who grows up in a dysfunctional family, is a whimsical and a carefree woman. She strives to bring happiness to others and in the process finds the love that she yearns for.

A controversial look at the way the media portrays criminals.

plot: Renton is a drug addict who tries to mend his ways by moving to London and starting life afresh. He, however, is pulled back into the world of addiction by his friends.

plot: A young Kansas girl who dreams of a better life "somewhere over the rainbow" is caught in the eye of a tornado and lands in the fantasy world of Oz.

title: Shining, The
plot: Jack Torrance (Jack Nicholson) becomes winter caretaker at the isolated Overlook Hotel in Colorado, hoping to cure his writer's block. As Jack's writing goes nowhere and Danny's visions become more disturbing, Jack discovers the hotel's dark secrets and begins to unravel into a homicidal maniac hell-bent on terrorizing his family.â€?Â More

plot: Peter Parker, a shy high school student, is often bullied by people. His life changes when he is bitten by a genetically altered spider and gains superpowers.

plot: Street-smart Ferris knows all the tricks. Determined to enjoy a day off from school with his friends, Ferris uses his bag of tricks to baffle the ever suspicious dean of students.

title: American History X

plot: Captain Willard is sent to Cambodia on a dangerous mission to assassinate a renegade colonel who has won the trust of a local tribe.

plot: When Woody is toy-napped by a greedy toy collector and is nowhere to be found, Buzz and his friends set out to rescue him. But Woody too is tempted by the idea of becoming immortal in a museum.

plot: Joel and Clementine begin a relationship post a train journey together, unaware that they had previously been in a relationship-gone-sour, memories of which were clinically erased.

plot: Fired from his job for exposing the alleged illegal practices that exist in his profession, sports agent Jerry Maguire starts his own agency. But he manages to find only one client.

title: Jaws
plot: A police chief, a marine scientist and a fisherman spring into action after a white shark terrorises the inhabitants of Amity, a quiet island.

title: Broken Arrow
plot: A pilot holds the US government to ransom by stealing a nuclear warhead and threatening to detonate it in a major city.

title: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
plot: Austin Powers, a cryogenically frozen British spy from 1960s, is thawed and reinstated when his arch nemesis Dr. Evil returns from space and terrorizes earth with his evil schemes.

title: Birdcage, The
plot: Armand and Albert have built the perfect life for themselves tending to their gaudy Miami nightclub. But their pastel harmony is shaken when Armand's son decides to marry Senator Keele's daughter.

title: Full Metal Jacket
plot: Stanley Kubrick's take on the Vietnam War follows smart-aleck Private Davis (Matthew Modine), quickly christened "Joker" by his foul-mouthed drill sergeant (R. Lee Ermey), and pudgy Private Lawrence (Vincent D'Onofrio), nicknamed "Gomer Pyle," as they endure the rigors of basic training. Though Pyle takes a frightening detour, Joker graduates to the Marine Corps and is sent to Vietnam as a journalist, covering -- and eventually participating in -- the bloody Battle of HuÃ©.â€?Â More

plot: Two young graduates meet and their friendship culminates into a close bond. However, in their search of love, they keep ending up with each other and must face their true feelings.

title: Kill Bill: Vol. 1
plot: A pregnant woman, codenamed the Bride, goes into coma after she is brutally attacked by her former boss Bill. Four years later, she sets out to seek revenge on Bill and his associates.

plot: Toon Roger suspects his wife and hires a detective, Eddie Valiant. But when studio owner Marvin Acme is found dead, all fingers point at Roger.

plot: Melvin, a rude, obsessive-compulsive writer is forced to take care of his neighbour's dog. With time, he begins to bond with the dog and also falls in love with Carol, a waitress at a local eatery.

title: Leaving Las Vegas
plot: Adapted from the novel by John O'Brien, this acclaimed drama follows alcoholic screenwriter Ben Sanderson (Nicolas Cage) as he drinks himself into oblivion in Las Vegas. When Ben meets the beautiful prostitute Sera (Elisabeth Shue), they strike up an unconventional relationship -- one where she can't ask him to curb his drinking, and he can't fault her for her job. Though they offer each other support, Ben's self-destruction threatens to eclipse their bond.â€?Â More

plot: Edward, a synthetic man with scissor hands, is taken in by Peg, a kindly Avon lady, after the passing of his inventor. Things take a turn for the worse when he is blamed for a crime he did not commit.

plot: Legendary archaeologist Indiana Jones is on his new adventure. This time he's in an Indian village where evil spirits have abducted all the children post the disappearance of a sacred, precious stone.

title: Breakfast Club, The
plot: Five high school students from different walks of life endure a Saturday detention under a power-hungry principal (Paul Gleason). Each has a chance to tell his or her story, making the others see them a little differently -- and when the day ends, they question whether school will ever be the same.â€?Â More

title: Armageddon
plot: NASA astronauts observe that a large asteroid will hit earth in the next eighteen days and destroy life. They also realise that their hunger for survival solely relies on one man who can save them.

title: Green Mile, The
plot: Paul Edgecomb, the head guard of a prison, meets a new inmate, John Coffey, who is accused of murdering two girls. His life changes drastically when he discovers that John has a special gift.

plot: Pet detective Ace Ventura comes out of retirement to investigate the disappearance of a rare white bat, the symbol of an African tribe. Needless to say, when Ace gets involved, all hell breaks loose.

plot: Honouring the request of a desperate man, Sister Helen Prejean writes to the condemned killer of two teenage lovers, and is wholly unprepared for the relationship that develops.

plot: Two goons mistake 'the Dude' Lebowski for a millionaire Lebowski and urinate on his rug. Trying to recompense his rug from the wealthy Lebowski, he gets entwined in an intricate kidnapping case.

plot: After the death of their father, three daughters are left in poverty. The eldest two, who are polar opposites, deal with love, romance and heartbreak.

title: Monty Python's Life of Brian
plot: Brian Cohen (Graham Chapman) is an average young Jewish man, but through a series of ridiculous events, he gains a reputation as the Messiah. When he's not dodging his followers or being scolded by his shrill mother (Terry Jones), the hapless Brian has to contend with the pompous Pontius Pilate (Michael Palin) and acronym-obsessed members of a separatist movement. Rife with Monty Python's signature absurdity, the tale finds Brian's life paralleling Biblical lore, albeit with many more laughs.â€?Â More

title: Amadeus
plot: Antonio Salieri envies Mozart whom he believes to be a great musician. Having come to the conclusion that Mozart receives divine assistance in his compositions, Salieri turns against God.

title: Dead Poets Society
plot: An unconventional English teacher encourages his prep school students to put their individuality before norms and follow their own dreams.

title: Nightmare Before Christmas, The
actor5: Clown with the Tear Away Face
plot: Jack Skellington, a being from Halloween Town, finds Christmas Town and is instantly enchanted. The situation becomes riveting when his obsession with Christmas leads him to abduct Santa Claus.

plot: Flik leads an army of ants against a group of grasshoppers who bully them. He also enlists the help of a troop of bugs to help him.

plot: Batman has a new foe, the Joker, who is an accomplished criminal hell-bent on decimating Gotham City. Together with Gordon and Harvey Dent, Batman struggles to thwart the Joker before it is too late.

title: Top Gun

However, after playing several gigs and making a few enemies, including the police, the brothers face daunting odds to deliver the money on time.â€?Â More

Mars Attacks!

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
plot: Harry returns to Hogwarts for his third year, and not only does he has a new defense against dark arts teacher, he also comes face-to-face with his godfather, Siris Black, a convicted murderer.

title: Wayne's World
plot: Wayne and Garth own a public access TV show and can't believe their luck when a local station decides to hire them. They later find that the show is no longer the same. Can they save their show?

title: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
plot: Captain Kirk and his crew have to travel back in time to reverse the disastrous effects caused by an unknown space probe on planet earth.

title: Lethal Weapon 2
plot: Two LAPD officers are assigned the task of protecting a witness. While doing so, they try to expose corrupt diplomats, who use their power and immunity to engage in criminal activities.

title: Pocahontas
plot: Chief Pohatan has decided to get his daughter Pocahontas married to New World's greatest and bravest warrior. But Pocahontas dreams of marrying a prince named Smith.

title: Mask of Zorro, The
plot: Zorro sets out to avenge his wife's murder and find his daughter. In his mission, he is aided by his successor, who also has his own agenda.

title: Sabrina
plot: An ugly duckling transforms into a beautiful damsel still harbors feelings for her crush: a carefree playboy, but his business focused elder brother falls in love with her.

title: Patriot, The
plot: After getting married, ferocious veteran Benjamin forsakes his violent past. As a widower, he raises his seven children alone. Will he join the nation's war to protect his family?

title: City of God
plot: Two boys are brought up in a sadistic neighbourhood of Rio de Janeiro. They adopt diverse professional paths, with one of them becoming a photographer and the other boy becoming a drug dealer.

title: 12 Angry Men
plot: A dissenting juror in a murder trial slowly manages to convince the others that the case is not as obviously clear as it seemed in court.

title: Christmas Story, A
plot: Ralphie, a nine-year-old boy, tries to convince his parents, his teacher and Santa that he needs a Red Ryder BB gun for Christmas.

title: Three Musketeers, The
plot: Three swordsmen from the disbanded French king's guard and a young man, who dreams of joining them, set out to save their King from the scheming, Cardinal Richelieu.

title: Batman Returns
plot: When Max, an evil entrepreneur, and ringmaster Penguin team up to wreak havoc in Gotham City, Batman decides to fight them.

title: City Slickers II: The Legend of Curly's Gold
plot: Mitch Robbins and his adventure-hungry friends come across a map that belonged to their former leader Curly. They must now set out on a gruelling journey to find the treasure before anyone else.

title: Pinocchio
plot: Pinocchio, a marionette, must earn the right to become human by proving his truthfulness, bravery and unselfishness. A cricket, Jiminy, constantly assists him, as his conscience.

title: Grumpier Old Men
plot: Max and John, who are obsessed with fishing, attempt to save their favourite bait shop from turning into an Italian restaurant.

title: Big Fish
plot: Will refuses to believe his father Edward's larger-than-life experiences. But he is surprised when several characters, whom Edward had made a mention of, come to attend his father's funeral.

title: From Dusk Till Dawn
plot: On the run from a bank robbery that left several police officers dead, Seth Gecko (George Clooney) and his paranoid, loose-cannon brother, Richard (Quentin Tarantino), hightail it to the Mexican border. Kidnapping preacher Jacob Fuller (Harvey Keitel) and his kids, the criminals sneak across the border in the family's RV and hole up in a topless bar. Unfortunately, the bar also happens to be home base for a gang of vampires, and the brothers and their hostages have to fight their way out.â€?Â More

title: Johnny Mnemonic
plot: Johnny is a data courier who literally carries data packages inside his head for a fee. This time he carries a package that is too large to hold for long and he must race against time to deliver it.

title: Planet of the Apes
plot: When astronaut Taylor's spaceship crash-lands on an unknown planet, to his horror, he realizes the planet is ruled by apes much advanced than humans. How will Taylor lead his team to safety?

title: Disclosure
plot: A happily married man up for a promotion is accused of sexual harassment by a former girlfriend, who is now his boss. He must now try and stop his personal life from ruining his career.

title: Casper
plot: Carrigan Crittenden hires paranormal expert Dr. James Harvey to exorcise the ghosts from her mansion. The situation changes when Harvey's daughter befriends Casper, a friendly ghost.

title: Rob Roy
plot: Rob Roy tries to transform his small town to a better place, by borrowing money to buy and herd cattle. When the money is stolen, he is forced to play Robin Hood.

title: Notting Hill
plot: A British bookseller meets a high-profile American actress. They grow fond of each other and eventually fall in love. However, this doesn't go down well with her boyfriend.

title: Bridge on the River Kwai, The
plot: Colonel Nicholson reluctantly agrees to camp commander Saito's suggestion of getting the World War II POWs to build a railway bridge. However, the project soon becomes an obsession for him.

title: Phenomenon
plot: George, a mechanic, sees a strange light one day and turns into a genius. While he puts his intelligence to good use, others are stumped and call him names.

title: Last of the Mohicans, The
plot: Amidst the British and French battle in colonial America, Hawkeye, the adopted son of a Mohican scout, romances Cora, a British officer's daughter.

title: Sneakers
plot: Martin Bishop heads a group of experts who specialise in testing security systems. When government agents blackmail him into stealing a top secret black box, his team is embroiled in a dangerous game.

title: Lawrence of Arabia
plot: Lawrence, a lieutenant in the British Army, is asked by Colonel Brighton to moderately assess Faisal, their ally. Lawrence is impressed with Faisal and seeks his help to plan an attack on the enemy.

title: So I Married an Axe Murderer
plot: A dedicated poet who has no luck with women finds his true love in a girl who is a butcher by profession. Soon he starts suspecting her of a gory past that could prove fatal for him.

title: Crying Game, The
plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists befriends one of his captors.

title: Casino Royale
plot: Special Agent James Bond embarks on a mission to prevent Le Chiffre, a mob banker, from winning a high stakes poker game. He is aided by Vesper Lynd, a British Treasury agent.

title: Star Wars: Episode III - Revenge of the Sith
plot: Anakin joins forces with Obi-Wan and sets Palpatine free from the evil clutches of Count Doku. But he falls prey to mind games that are played by Palpatine and the Jedis and gives into temptation.

title: Crocodile Dundee
plot: A journalist travels to Australia to interview a unique crocodile poacher. When he saves her from a crocodile, she invites him to New York. Despite their cultural differences, they fall in love.

title: Matrix Revolutions, The
plot: Neo, humanity's only hope of stopping the war and saving Zion, attempts to broker peace between the machines and humans. However, he must first confront his arch nemesis, the rogue agent Smith.

title: Bowling for Columbine
plot: The film explores the causes for the Columbine High School massacre along with other acts of violence and takes a look at America's love affair with firearms and the pathology of violence in US.

title: Field of Dreams
plot: Field of Dreams is a 1989 American fantasy-drama film directed by Phil Alden Robinson, who also wrote the screenplay, adapting W. P. Kinsella's novel Shoeless Joe. Wikipedia

title: Glory
plot: Robert Shaw, a white officer, faces opposition from his fellow officers and ire from enemy soldiers for leading a battalion of black soldiers.

title: Thelma & Louise
plot: Docile housewife Thelma accompanies her pal Louise, an independent waitress, on a brief fishing trip. However, Louise kills a man who endeavours to rape Thelma at a bar. The two flee to Mexico.

title: French Kiss
plot: Kate plans to confront her straying husband who stays in France. On her way she meets Luc, a thief, who hides a stolen necklace in her bag. Her life changes when she falls in love with Luc.

title: Executive Decision
plot: When a few terrorists hijack a flight, an intelligence agent accompanied by military personnel embarks on a mission to save the passengers.

title: WALL¬∑E
plot: A robot who is responsible for cleaning a waste-covered Earth meets another robot and falls in love with her. Together, they set out on a journey that will alter the fate of mankind.

title: 28 Days Later
plot: After a mysterious virus wreaks havoc in the United Kingdom, a team of survivors tries to cope with the aftermath of the disaster and find security.

title: Father of the Bride Part II
plot: George Banks thought his worries were finally over and he could now lead a peaceful existence. But, life has many ways to astonish him. This time, the father of the bride gets two surprise packages.

title: Maltese Falcon, The
plot: Bogart's private eye Sam Spade finds himself stalked by a magnificent array of villains as he searches for a mysterious statuette.

title: First Knight
plot: Lancelot falls in love with Guinevere, who is due to be married to King Arthur. Meanwhile, a violent warlord tries to seize power from Arthur and his Knights of the Round Table.

title: Three Kings
plot: Just as the war ends in Iraq, a group of soldiers stumble upon information about a huge cache of gold hidden near their base. A few unexpected discoveries turn the adventurous joyride into a mission.

title: Bridget Jones's Diary
plot: Bridget, a slacker, decides to turn her life around and maintains a log of her attempts, all the while looking for love. Along come not one but two suitors, getting her more than she bargained for.

title: Bad Boys
plot: Marcus, a family man, and Mike, a ladies' man, are partners in the Miami police. Things get complicated when they assume each other's identity while investigating a drug deal.

title: Iron Man
plot: When an industrialist is captured, he constructs a high-tech armoured suit to escape. Once he manages to escape, he decides to use his suit to fight against evil forces and save the world.

title: Tomorrow Never Dies
plot: Bond must prevent a media tycoon from waging a war between China and the UK.  In order to do so, he must confront his ex-lover who is now the tycoon's wife.

title: Thomas Crown Affair, The
plot: Thomas Crown, a millionaire, is bored easily as there is nothing in the world he cannot buy. He develops a hobby: to steal priceless works of art. He meets his match in an investigator, Catherine.

title: Little Miss Sunshine
plot: A family travels across the country when their daughter wants to participate in a beauty pageant. Things take a turn when they set out on their journey.

title: Splash
plot: Allen is rescued from drowning by a mermaid. Years later, he returns to the same location, and manages to fall into the sea, and is rescued by the mermaid.

title: Dark City
plot: John awakens in a hotel with no memory and learns that he's wanted for a series of murders. In trying to find answers, he discovers a group of aliens called the Strangers who are controlling the city.

title: Ice Age
plot: Manny the mammoth, Sid the loquacious sloth, and Diego the sabre-toothed tiger go on a comical quest to return a human baby back to his father, across a world on the brink of an ice age.

title: Muriel's Wedding
plot: Although she's never had a date, a young woman goes about the business of landing herself a husband.

title: Time to Kill, A
plot: After his ten-year-old daughter is raped, Carl murders her perpetrators. He then faces a trial and calls upon his friend Jake Tyler, a lawyer, to help him win the case.

title: Magnolia
plot: An epical montage and interesting study of interrelated characters who undergo different types of crisis and introspection. They are seeking contentment and forgiveness in the San Fernando Valley.

title: Shaun of the Dead
plot: Shaun is a salesman whose life has no direction. He has a rocky relationship with his stepfather, mother and girlfriend. Suddenly, he has to deal with an entire community of zombies.

title: Deep Impact
plot: According to predictions, a deadly comet will strike earth and destroy  humanity. US President Beck comes up with a plan and starts building a network of caves to accommodate one million Americans.

title: 10 Things I Hate About You
plot: High school boy Cameron can't date Bianca until her anti-social older sister Kat has a boyfriend. So he pays a mysterious bad-boy to charm Kat in this romantic comedy.

title: Seven Samurai
plot: A veteran samurai, gathers six samurais to protect a village from the cruel bandits. As the samurais teach the natives how to defend themselves, the village is attacked by a pack of 40 bandits.

title: Moulin Rouge
plot: Christian, an English writer, travels to Paris to join the Bohemian revolution. He visits the city's biggest night club, Moulin Rouge, and falls in love with its star performer and courtesan, Satine.

title: Jackie Brown
plot: A flight attendant caught smuggling gun money has to choose between teaming up with the cops to bust her arms dealer boss or keeping her mouth shut and going to jail.

title: Postman, The
plot: When exiled Cuban poet Pablo Neruda (Philippe Noiret) arrives on a tiny Italian isle, there's so much new mail that Mario (Massimo Troisi), an unemployed, uneducated layabout, is hired as a postman. His job is simply to deliver Neruda's daily mail. Mario soon becomes a student of the poet, learning the art of poetry to woo a local barmaid (Maria Grazia Cucinotta) and tell about the struggles of the working-class villagers. A firm friendship develops, and the postman turns into a changed man.â€?Â More

title: Good Morning, Vietnam
plot: Adrian, a disc jockey, goes from Crete to Vietnam to work for Armed Forces Radio Service. While he becomes popular among the troops, his superiors disapprove of his humour.

title: Spaceballs
plot: A hero and his trusty half-man, half-dog set out to rescue a kidnapped princess from the clutches of an evil despot.

title: X-Files: Fight the Future, The
plot: Two FBI agents set out to unravel a government conspiracy related to the alien colonisation of Earth and attempt to rescue the people on the planet.

title: Devil's Advocate, The
plot: Kevin Lomax, a lawyer, gets a job with a law firm in New York. Soon, Kevin realises that his boss is the Devil himself and has evil plans to torture Kevin.

title: Blade
plot: Blade, who is part-vampire and part-mortal, becomes a vampire hunter, slays vampires and protects human beings. He prevents vampires from taking control over the human race.

title: Cool Hand Luke
plot: Luke Jackson is a cool,gutsy prisoner in a Southern chain gang,who, while refusing to buckle under authority,keeps escaping and being recaptured.The camp staff actively works to crush Luke.

title: Highlander
plot: Scottish swordsman Connor Macleod, born in 1518, is an immortal. He must fight the remaining opponent immortals in the present time to win the fabled prize against the evil Kurgan.

title: Animal House
plot: When they arrive at college, socially inept freshmen Larry (Thomas Hulce) and Kent (Stephen Furst) attempt to pledge the snooty Omega Theta Pi House, but are summarily rejected. Lowering their standards, they try at the notoriously rowdy Delta Tau Chi House, and get in. The trouble is, the college dean (John Vernon) has it in for the Deltas. He has put them on "Double Secret Probation" and secretly assigned Omega's president (James Daughton) the task of having their charter revoked.â€?Â More

title: River Wild, The
plot: A couple embarks on a rafting trip with their children. Their trip however turns into a nightmare when they find themselves battling two violent criminals.

title: You've Got Mail
plot: The owner of a bookstore chain meets the owner of a quaint little bookshop online and they fall in love with each other. However, they are unaware that they are actually business rivals.

title: Prestige, The
plot: Two friends and fellow magicians become bitter enemies after a sudden tragedy. As they devote themselves to this rivalry, they make sacrifices that bring them fame but with terrible consequences.

title: Hudsucker Proxy, The
plot: A corrupt executive tries to control his company by appointing a small-town naive business graduate to replace the president.

title: Nell
plot: Cut off from the modern world, Nell (Jodie Foster) is a wild child, who has lived her entire life with her mother in an isolated mountain cabin in North Carolina. When her mother dies, she is found by kindly Dr. Jerome Lovell (Liam Neeson), who is fascinated by Nell and the language she has developed. Lovell and the equally curious psychologist Dr. Paula Olsen (Natasha Richardson) eventually camp out near Nell's cabin, slowly introducing her to the larger world she's never known.â€?Â More

title: Goldfinger
plot: James Bond sets out on a mission to impede Auric Goldfinger's plan to raid Fort Knox and destroy the world economy. However, he must first successfully earn Auric's trust.

title: Nine Months
plot: After his girlfriend announces that she is pregnant, a child psychologist gets the jitters at the impending lifestyle change. He turns into a commitment-phobic person, which leads to troubles galore.

title: Gremlins
plot: Billy's father brings him an exotic pet from Chinatown. It comes with a set of instructions: no bright light, no water and no feeding past midnight. If the rules are broken, mayhem will ensue.

title: A.I. Artificial Intelligence
plot: David, a highly advanced robotic boy, longs to become human child so that he can regain the love of his foster mother who abandoned him. He goes on a long journey hoping to make his dreams come true.

title: Primal Fear
plot: All hope is lost for an Altar boy after he is accused of murdering a priest. A hot shot lawyer comes to his rescue and takes the case.

title: Specialist, The
plot: A woman entices a bomb expert she's involved with to use his skills to destroy the mafia that killed her family. Will he be successful?

title: Witness
plot: A young Amish boy, Samuel, is the sole witness to a murder in Philadelphia. Investigating officer John Book goes into hiding with the boy and his mother in Amish country after an attack on the boy.

title: Birds, The
plot: Melanie, a rich socialite, follows Mitch, a lawyer, to his home in Bodega Bay to play a practical joke on him. Things take a bizarre turn when the birds in the area begin to attack the people there.

title: Wild Wild West
plot: Special Agent Jim West and inventive US Marshal Artemus Gordon are ordered by President Ulysses Grant to team up to save the world from Dr Arliss Loveless's enormous steam-powered tarantula.

title: Dirty Dancing
plot: While holidaying with her parents at a placid resort, Frances is smitten with the resort's rebellious dance instructor. Her father opposes their relationship which creates a rift between him and her.

title: Basic Instinct
plot: Detective Nick is tasked with investigating the murder of Johnny Boz. He suspects Johnny's girlfriend Catherine to be responsible for the act, but things take a turn when he falls in love with her.

title: Tommy Boy
plot: When the owner of an auto parts factory passes away, his relatives try to sell it and wash their hands off responsibilities. Now it's up to his immature, incompetent, son to save the business.

title: Searching for Bobby Fischer
plot: Inspired by the life of chess prodigy. Josh is a normal kid and loves to play football. But, his father notices signs of him being a genius at chess and encourages him.

title: Alien: Resurrection
plot: Two hundred years have passed since Ellen Ripley (Sigourney Weaver) died on Fiorina 161. Aboard the medical research vessel USM Auriga, a team of scientists clone Ripley from her extracted DNA and removes the alien Queen embryo which was growing inside her at the time of her death.

title: Some Like It Hot
plot: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state disguised as women in an all female band, but further complications set in.

title: Great Escape, The
plot: During the Second World War, a large group of imprisoned Allied soldiers, known for breaking out of prison, are confined in an escape-proof prison camp.

title: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
plot: After years of war, the Federation and Klingon empire prepare for a peace summit. But the prospect of intergalactic glasnost with sworn enemies is an alarming one to Captain Kirk.

title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
plot: Admiral Kirk has defeated the genetically created genius Khan, but Spock is dead and McCoy is suffering from a strange mental abnormality. Kirk takes the Enterprise to Genesis to recover the body.

title: Bourne Ultimatum, The
plot: Jason Bourne, a former CIA assassin who suffers from amnesia, sets out to track down a CIA official whilst trying to retain memories of a forgotten past.

title: Kingpin
plot: A pro bowler, Roy Munson, who loses his hand in an accident, meets an Amish boy with a budding bowling talent. Determined to regain his success, Roy starts training the boy vigorously.

title: Mortal Kombat
plot: Three martial arts warriors journey to a faraway island to engage in battle to save the Earth. Their aim is to make sure that truth triumphs in the fight against evil.

title: Juno
plot: Social misfit Juno protects herself with a caustic wit, but her unplanned pregnancy has the teen getting more involved in the lives of her baby's adoptive parents than she expected.

title: Cocoon
plot: The residents of a retirement home rediscover their youth thanks to a mysterious swimming pool and friendly aliens.

title: Remains of the Day, The
plot: Post the Second World War, a butler's loyalty is tested when a housekeeper falls in love with him.

title: Wag the Dog
plot: The President of the U.S.A. is caught in a sex scandal a few days before the elections. To avoid media outburst and public outrage, Conrad Bean, his aide, constructs a fake war against Albania.

title: Donnie Brasco
plot: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the life of a gangster. He subsequently finds himself identifying more with gangsterism instead of his regular life.

title: Deer Hunter, The
plot: In the backdrop of the US-Vietnam war, three friends who join the army to fight in Vietnam are later captured by the enemy forces. They manage to escape but are soon separated and imprisoned again.

title: Tin Cup
plot: A small-town Texas golf player qualifies and enters the U.S. Open golf tournament in order to win the respect and love of his rival's girlfriend.

title: Signs
plot: Graham Hess along with his family migrates to a farmhouse where crop circles begin to appear. At first, he ignores the signs but is alarmed when an alien activity is spotted around the world.

title: African Queen, The
plot: Charlie Allnut, the captain of a steamer called the African Queen, meets Rose Sayer, sister of a British missionary, Samuel Sayer. In spite of being totally opposite to each other, they fall in love.

title: Blazing Saddles
plot: When the sheriff of a small town is killed, Bart is appointed the first black sheriff of all-white Rock Ridge by the evil Hedley Lamarr, who hopes this will chase the townspeople from their homes.

title: Beverly Hills Cop
plot: Police officer Axel Foley's close friend Mikey Tandino is murdered soon after he arrives in Detroit. Axel takes up the investigation of the case, which leads him to the crime world of Beverly Hills.

title: Pianist, The
plot: Gifted pianist Wladyslaw Szpilman is a Polish Jew. When the Nazis round up his family for the Nazi labour camps, he escapes and avoids capture by hiding in the ruins of Warsaw.

title: Scarface
plot: Tony Montana and his close friend Manny, build a strong drug empire in Miami. However as his power begins to grow, so does his ego and his enemies, and his own paranoia begins to plague his empire.

title: Last Samurai, The
plot: Captain Nathan Algren is hired to train the Japanese army to fight a Samurai rebellion. He, however, ends up embracing the same Samurai culture which he was assigned to destroy.

title: Hoop Dreams
plot: Every school day, African-American teenagers William Gates and Arthur Agee travel 90 minutes each way from inner-city Chicago to St. Joseph High School in Westchester, Illinois, a predominately white suburban school well-known for the excellence of its basketball program. Gates and Agee dream of NBA stardom, and with the support of their close-knit families, they battle the social and physical obstacles that stand in their way. This acclaimed documentary was shot over the course of five years.â€?Â More

title: Goonies, The
plot: A group of west coast kids facing their last days together before a development paves over their homes stumble onto evidence of pirate's treasure attracting the attention of a family of criminals.

title: Hunchback of Notre Dame, The
plot: Quasimodo, a deformed bell-ringer in Notre Dame, breaks free from his self-imposed stupor and stands up to his tyrant guardian in a bid to help Esmeralda, a gypsy girl.

title: Little Women
plot: After their father leaves to fight in the Union Army, Meg, Jo, Beth and Amy, the four March sisters, and their mother, struggle to live in a 19th century America that's struck by the Civil War.

title: Conspiracy Theory
plot: Jerry Fletcher is a New York taxi driver who has a strange habit. He makes complicated scenarios of conspiracies and publishes them in a newsletter sent out to five recipients.

title: Adventures of Priscilla, Queen of the Desert, The
plot: Two drag queens and a transsexual take their act on the road. They have several adventures and uncover deep secrets as they travel across Australia, entertaining homophobes and enthusiasts alike.

title: No Country for Old Men
plot: A hunter's life takes a drastic turn when he discovers two million dollars while strolling through the aftermath of a drug deal. He is then pursued by a psychopathic killer who wants the money.

title: Best in Show
plot: The owners of five show dogs head for a national dog show with a film crew accompanying them to get a 'behind the scenes' look in the highly competitive and cut-throat world of dog-shows.

title: James and the Giant Peach
plot: An orphaned boy drops magical crocodile tongues which later grow into a never ending peach tree. He finds his new family which are six insects that help him on his adventure.

title: Singin' in the Rain
plot: Don and Lina are a famous on-screen romantic pair. Lina mistakes the on-screen romance for real love. Kathy is brought in to work and Don falls in love with her. How will this love triangle end ?

title: Chocolat
plot: Based on the life of Jacqueline Susann, author and actress. After many failures in her acting career, Susann meets and marries a successful promoter who tries to save her career.

title: William Shakespeare's Romeo + Juliet
plot: Rivalry between Verona's two well-established families, Capulets and Montagues, affects the relationship of their children, Romeo and Juliet.

title: Black Hawk Down
plot: Captain Mike Steele leads a team of nearly 100 US Army Rangers who travel to the capital city of Mogadishu to nab the top two lieutenants of a Somali warlord.

title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
plot: Toula, a Greek woman trying to come to terms with her heritage, falls in love with a non-Greek man, and has to convince her family to accept him.

title: Fly, The
plot: Seth, a brilliant scientist, is elated when he successfully manages to teleport himself in his own invention, a transportation machine. But, unbeknownst to him, he was not alone during the process.

title: NeverEnding Story, The
plot: To escape from his dull life and bullies at school, Bastain takes refuge in an old book store. There he begins reading an old story book and finds himself drawn into the mythical world of Fantasia.

title: Antz
plot: Z, an ant, feels irrelevant in his anthill. Soon, he meets Bala who also feels the same when it comes to her social skills. Unaware that destiny has some huge plans for both of them, they meet again.

title: Godfather: Part III, The
plot: Michael Corleone decides to put an end to all the criminal activities his family is involved in. However, the mob leader refuses to let him go. Also, his nephew wants a piece of his criminal empire.

title: Tron
plot: Kevin, a software programmer, is dragged into the virtual world where he is pitted against a malevolent software. He takes the help of Tron, a security programme that helps him defeat the villain.

title: I.Q.
plot: A romantic comedy about a young man who falls in love with Albert Einstein's neice and tries to win her over with Einstein's help.

title: Lady and the Tramp
plot: Lady, a female dog, belongs to Jim and Darling. She feels neglected when they get a baby in the house. When Aunt Sarah gets her Siamese twin cats too, Lady is blamed for all the havoc they wreak.

title: Others, The
plot: Grace moves into a new house with her two photosensitive children in Jersey. When a series of inexplicable events occur, Grace starts believing that her house is haunted.

title: Gandhi
plot: A lawyer, Mohandas Gandhi, returns to British India from South Africa. He begins a nationwide campaign of non-violent resistance against British rule. The campaign pressures Britain to liberate India.

title: League of Their Own, A
plot: Dottie and Kit are drafted into a professional baseball league along with several other women. Jimmy, an alcoholic and a former star is forced to manage them. Can they work together to build a team?

title: Dracula
plot: Vlad Dracula turns into a bloodthirsty demon after his wife Elisabeta commits suicide. He travels to London after finding out that his wife has reincarnated in the form of his lawyer's fiancee Mina.

title: Ronin
plot: Sam, an ex-US intelligence officer, hires a band of Japanese mercenaries to retrieve a mysterious suitcase which is about to fall into the hands of the Russians.

title: My Best Friend's Wedding
plot: Julianne is shocked when she learns that her best friend Michael is soon getting married. Overcome with a surge of mixed emotions, she makes up her mind to sabotage his wedding and make him her own.

title: Flintstones, The
plot: When Fred Flintstone helps out his friend Barney Rubble in his time of need, Barney returns the favour by getting Fred his dream job. However, their friendship suffers.

title: Copycat
plot: An agoraphobic psychologist agrees to help a detective hunt for a serial killer - not realising she is his next intended victim.

title: Space Jam
plot: After Michael Jordan's retirement, he is abducted by Bugs Bunny from the Looney Tunes group and is asked to play a match to defeat the Nerdlucks, a criminal alien group led by Mister Swackhammer.

title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
plot: In his fourth year at Hogwarts, Harry is unwittingly selected to compete in the Triwizard Tournament. Harry is forced to compete against older wizards and face dangerous and magical creatures.

title: Junior
plot: Alex and Larry are working on a drug which will help women conceive a baby. Things take a turn when their funds are withdrawn. To keep their experiment running, Alex agrees to become the subject.

title: Perfect Storm, The
plot: When a commercial fishing vessel is caught aboard in a dangerous storm, the crew finds itself struggling for survival.

title: Swingers
plot: Comedy in which smooth talker Trent decides to help his lovesick buddy Mike get over a breakup and the duo head to Hollywood's coolest hangouts in search of a good time.

title: Fatal Attraction
plot: Dan Callagher, a married lawyer, gets into an extra-marital affair with his colleague Alex. She gets obsessed with him and tries to sabotage his married life.

title: Star Trek: The Motion Picture
plot: When a destructive space shuttle is spotted approaching Earth, Admiral Kirk resumes command of the Star-ship Enterprise in order to seize, examine, and hopefully stop it before it destroys the earth.

title: Avatar
plot: Jake, a paraplegic marine, replaces his brother on the Na'vi inhabited Pandora for a corporate mission. He is accepted by the natives as one of their own but he must decide where his loyalties lie.

title: Brady Bunch Movie, The

Backdraft

plot: A policeman decides to narrate his heroics of killing three assassins called Long Sky, Flying Snow and Broken Sword, to Qin, the King of China.

plot: Amsterdam Vallon sets out to avenge his father who was killed in a gang fight at the hands of a crime lord. Whilst doing so, he gets caught up in the Civil War.

But, as he develops psychic powers, he realizes that those around him have taken advantage of his simplicity his whole life, and he plots a bloody revenge.â€?Â More

This ratification of his existence leads him from one misadventure to another -- as he invents gadgets, dodges bullets, joins the carnival and seeks love in the arms of beautiful Marie (Bernadette Peters).â€?Â More

plot: When his wife is killed in action by an extremist group, Michael, a professor, becomes apprehensive of cultural sub-groups. He is suspicious of his new neighbours who seem to be hiding a dark secret.

plot: The Elephant Man is a 1980 American film about Joseph Merrick, a severely deformed man in 19th century London. Wikipedia

plot: A woman and her daughter hide in a secret room when intruders break into their home. When they learn that what they are trying to find is with them in the room, they begin to fear for their lives.

plot: Dr. John Dolittle has a special power to communicate with animals but his family and colleagues consider him insane. He must convince them before they put him in a mental institution.

plot: A reformed gambler must return to playing big stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks.

plot: John Tunstall (Terence Stamp), a distinguished British gentleman, employs downtrodden youths to tend his herd on the New Mexican frontier. title: Equilibrium
plot: In a world where every form of human emotion is prohibited, Preston, an officer responsible for implementing the law, decides to revolt against it.

plot: Harold Abrahams, a devout Jew, and Eric Liddell, a staunch Christian, who are competitors of each other, get a chance to represent Great Britain at the 1924 Olympics in Paris.

plot: Los Angeles high school teacher Jaime Escalante (Edward James Olmos) is being hassled by tough students like Angel Guzman (Lou Diamond Phillips). But Jaime is also pressured by his bosses, who want him to control his raucous classroom. Caught in the middle, he opts to immerse his students in higher math. After intensive study, his students ace California's calculus test, only to learn that their scores are being questioned. They'll have to retake the exam in order to quiet the critics.â€?Â More

plot: After World War II, Antonia (Willeke van Ammelrooy) and her daughter, Danielle (Els Dottermans), go back to their Dutch hometown, where Antonia's late mother has bestowed a small farm upon her. Those around her include quirky friend Crooked Finger (Mil Seghers), would-be suitor Bas (Jan Decleir) and, eventually for Antonia, a granddaughter and great-granddaughter who help create a strong family of empowered women.â€?Â More

plot: After the death of their parents, Sally and Gillian Owens move in with their aunts, Jet and Frances. The two sisters have nothing in common except their hereditary gift for practical magic.

plot: A writer moves to his lakeside cabin to find solitude. A psychotic stalker blames him for plagiarising his work and refuses to leave him alone.

Along the way they turn tricks for money and drugs, eventually attracting the attention of a wealthy benefactor and sexual deviant.â€?Â More

plot: Alice wakes up to find that the city is infested with zombies and monsters. She tries her best to escape the terror before it is too late.

plot: Igby Slocumb (Kieran Culkin), a rebellious and sarcastic 17-year-old boy, is at war with the stifling world of old money privilege he was born into. With a schizophrenic father (Bill Pullman), a self-absorbed, distant mother (Susan Sarandon), and a shark-like young Republican big brother (Ryan Phillippe), Igby figures there must be a better life out there -- and sets about finding it.â€?Â More

plot: Michael, a reverse engineer, is pursued by the cops on charges of murder and treason. Suffering from amnesia and on the run, he is forced to piece together his past.

plot: Dr. Ryan Stone, an engineer on her first time on a space mission, and Matt Kowalski, an astronaut on his final expedition, have to survive in space after they are hit by debris while spacewalking.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
plot: Veteran animator Hayao Miyazaki directs this buoyant children's adventure yarn about a young witch striking out on her own. At her mother's behest, 13-year-old Kiki sets out on a year-long apprenticeship with her black cat in tow. With a shaky command of her broom, she ends up in a charming little coastal town that looks like a cross between the French provincial and San Francisco. Unfortunately, the local hotels have a strict no witches policy and the police have taken a dim view of her recent aerial mischief making. She's saved from the street by a kindly baker's wife who offers her room and board in exchange for her delivering by broom the baker's wares. Soon she befriends a college-aged artist, an old women who fusses over her, and a boy her same age who is nursing a massive crush. All is well until she wakes up one day and realizes that she can't make her broom levitate nor can she talk to her cat. What will Kiki do? ~ Jonathan Crow, All Movie Guideâ€?Â More

title: Muppets Take Manhattan, The
plot: The Muppets graduate from college and travel to New York, endeavouring to sell their musical to Broadway theatre producers. They ultimately find one idealistic man who embraces their musical.

plot: An exfiltration specialist masquerades as a Hollywood producer in order to rescue six Americans who are held captive in Tehran during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran.

plot: Hayes Hodges, an attorney, takes up the offer of defending his friend Colonel Terry Childers, accused of ordering his squad to open fire on a group of demonstrators.

title: Barry Lyndon
plot: Barry Lyndon is a 1975 British-American period drama film written, produced, and directed by Stanley Kubrick, based on the 1844 novel The Luck of Barry Lyndon by William Makepeace Thackeray. Wikipedia

plot: A jock bets that he can convert a girl in his high school into a prom queen. But his wicked sister and a devious cheerleader endeavour to thwart him.

Performances include "The Last Supper," "Silly Olympics," "Bishop on the Landing," "The Lumberjack Song" and "Four Yorkshiremen."â€?Â More

plot: Eddie, dismayed by his bleak future, is urged to try a drug that gives him a razor-sharp mind. As he rises in the corporate world, he also attracts the attention of a few negative elements.

The FBI agent is curious, but unimpressed until Fenton reveals that the killer is his younger brother Adam. This is a film about faith, family and the end of innocence.â€?Â More

plot: Paulina suspects that her house guest is the same man who kidnapped, tortured and raped her years ago. She holds him captive and tortures him to confess to the crimes.

plot: Lady Holiday's invaluable diamond necklace is stolen. Newspaper reporters, Kermit and Fozzie are sent to London to interview her. Kermit and Fozzie encounter the culprits.

plot: It's the wedding of Jim and Michelle and the gathering of their families and friends, including Jim's old friends from high school and Michelle's little sister. Cast: Jason Biggs, Alyson Hannigan.

plot: Bitter former schoolteacher Dora (Fernanda Montenegro) supports herself by taking dictation from illiterate people in Rio de Janeiro who want to write letters to their families and then pocketing their money without ever mailing the envelopes. title: Mercury Rising
plot: An outcast FBI agent is assigned to protect a nine year old autistic boy, as the boy becomes a target for assassin, after he cracks a top secret government code.

title: Shadow of the Vampire
plot: F. W. Murnau (John Malkovich) is struggling to create his silent classic "Nosferatu" on location in Eastern Europe. Schreck will appear only in character and only at night.â€?Â More

title: Sid and Nancy
plot: Following their breakout success in England, flagship punk rock band the Sex Pistols venture out on their first U.S. tour. title: Verdict, The
plot: Frank, a lawyer who has succumbed to alcohol, is assigned the case of medical malpractice. He decides to take the case on trail, even though all parties are willing for an outside court settlement.

In Los Angeles, no-nonsense taxi driver Corky (Winona Ryder) gets an engaging customer in the form of a Hollywood casting agent (Gena Rowlands), while a Parisian cabbie (Isaach De BankolÃ©) must contend with some rowdy African diplomats. Among the other tales, a standout is the Italian taxi ride that finds quirky driver Gino (Roberto Benigni) making a lively confession to an ailing priest.â€?Â More

title: Lawnmower Man 2: Beyond Cyberspace
plot: Jobe (Matt Frewer) exists as a malevolent consciousness in virtual reality and seeks to discover the technology to hack into all the world's computers. Jobe contacts Peter (Austin O'Brien), who had been a friend during his corporeal existence, to assist him, but the young man realizes Jobe's evil intent. Peter calls on Benjamin (Patrick Bergin), a brilliant computer engineer, to help thwart Jobe's scheme for world domination, and a battle rages throughout cyberspace and in the real world.â€?Â More

title: Rescuers Down Under, The
plot: Cody (Adam Ryen), a boy living in the Australian outback, frees a rare golden eagle from a trap. When an evil poacher (George C. Scott) kidnaps Cody to catch the eagle, a group of local animals contacts the Rescue Aid Society in New York City, who assign their top mice, Bernard (Bob Newhart) and Bianca (Eva Gabor), to the case. To save Cody and the eagle, the agents fly to Australia on a clumsy albatross (John Candy) and enlist the help of an adventurous kangaroo rat (Tristan Rogers).â€?Â More

title: Reindeer Games
plot: When his former cellmate Nick is killed during a prison riot, Rudy takes it as an opportunity to meet Nick's girlfriend. His plan goes awry when he finds himself being forced into a casino robbery.

plot: A journalist takes help from a computer hacker to investigate the disappearance of a woman who has been untraceable for forty years.

plot: A story revolving around the plight of a young drug pusher, juggling between his bosses and the detectives.

title: Living in Oblivion
plot: Everything goes wrong when Nick, an indie film-maker, tries to make a low-budget movie. The catering crew acts out, he is running out of money and time, and his lead actors don't seem to get along.

plot: When a member of their crew gets arrested for killing a New York City police horse by feeding it junk food, three slackin' stoners are forced to get off their butts and raise bail by selling pot stolen from a pharmaceutical lab. It's a risky plan but, hey, these are stand-up guys who would do anything to help out a friend in need.â€?Â More

title: Life as a House
plot: "Life as a House" is the poignant, often humorous journey of one man who decides to tear down his house -- and winds up rebuilding the world around him. From the day he picks up his sledgehammer, George Monroe embarks on a grand adventure that will shatter expectations and build a foundation for many different dreams among his family and neighbors.â€?Â More

title: Holes
plot: Elya Yelnats forgets to repay the gypsy Madame Zeroni. His family is cursed with bad luck for eternity. When Stanley Yelnats IV steals a baseball player's cleats, he is sent to Camp Green Lake.

plot: Ricky, a NASCAR racing sensation, is the number one racer in the world. After Jean beats him in a race and becomes the top racer, Ricky tries to regain his dominance and meets with an accident.

title: Godzilla
plot: A fire-breathing behemoth terrorizes Japan after an atomic bomb awakens it from its centuries-old sleep.

title: Paris, Texas
plot: A man wanders out of the desert not knowing who he is till one day his brother finds him and cures him off his sickness. As his memory returns, he makes contact with various ghosts from his past.

title: Speechless
plot: Two writers fall in love only to realise later that they are working for two rival political candidates. What also throws a spanner in the works is that both are being pursued by their ex lovers.

title: Pacific Heights
plot: Patty and Drake are a middle class couple who buy a large house in San Francisco and plan to rent it out. They unfortunately select a swindler, Hayes, as the tenant who changes their lives upside-down

title: Saved!
plot: A girl attending high school becomes pregnant, but she finds herself being targeted and taunted, when all of her former friends turn on her. But a twist of faith brings in a few supporters.

plot: A parody on some of the most popular Afro-American movies that follows Ashtray and his hometown friends and family. The craziness continues with his father and with his friend's trigger-happy grandma.

title: Nightmare on Elm Street 3: Dream Warriors, A
plot: The victims, who survive the attack of the dangerous killer Freddy Krueger, learn to control their dreams in an attempt to fight back.

title: Atonement
plot: Love story set in the 1930s. When a young girl catches her sister in a passionate embrace with a friend, her jealousy drives her to tell a lie that will change the course of all their lives forever.

plot: A man gets kidnapped by anti-government revolutionaries. When the company he works for refuses to intervene, his wife hires a professional negotiator to deal with the abductors.

plot: Annie, an orphan living under the tyrannical thumb of Miss Hannigan, gets lucky when she's selected to stay at the residence of a wealthy industrialist.

title: Good Girl, The
plot: Justine (Jennifer Aniston) is the good girl. Thirty years old and working in a Texas discount store, she is dissatisfied by her routine and disgusted by her lazy, pot-smoking husband. Her life is nearly at a standstill, until she suddenly notices Holden (Jake Gyllenhaal) a few cash registers away. He is young and seemingly as disaffected as she, and together the two forge a passionate connection destined to shatter everything Justine stands for, or at least thinks she does.â€?Â More

title: Rabbit-Proof Fence
plot: In 1931, three aboriginal girls escape after being plucked from their homes to be trained as domestic staff and set off on a trek across the Outback.

title: Throw Momma from the Train
plot: Black comedy about a writing student and instructor who 'trade murders' - the student will murder the instructor's ex-wife if the instructor will kill his demented, domineering mother.

title: One, The

title: Alien Nation

plot: A girl becomes pregnant with the child of her best friend's brother. Unaware, he leaves and the baby is born in secrecy. Later when they meet, the boy agrees to marry her despite family objections.

title: Futurama: Bender's Big Score

title: Stuart Saves His Family

plot: Cat Ballou faces numerous difficulties after she returns home and finds out that the Wolf City Development Corporation wants to take away her father's ranch.

After failing with his new team of misfits, Buttermaker enlists feisty and gifted pitcher Amanda Whurlitzer (Tatum O'Neal) to lead the charge -- but can he find the luck and patience to whip these outcasts into shape?â€?Â More

title: Clan of the Cave Bear, The
plot: Based on Jean Auel's best-selling novel of a golden-haired orphan raised by a primitive prehistoric tribe.

title: Tea with Mussolini
plot: In 1930s fascist Italy, adolescent Luca (Charlie Lucas) just lost his mother. Mary and her cultured friends -- including artist Arabella (Judi Dench), young widow Elsa (Cher) and archaeologist Georgie (Lily Tomlin) -- keep a watchful eye over the boy. But the women's cultivated lives take a dramatic turn when Allied forces declare war on Mussolini.â€?Â More

plot: Rambo enables a missionary and her comrades to enter Burma. Two weeks later, he gets a call requesting help as the missionaries have been held hostage by Burmese soldiers. He sets out to save them.

plot: Corie, a free-spirited young girl, marries Paul, a conservative lawyer. The couple stay in an apartment in Greenwich Village. The couple goes through rough patches due to a difference in opinion.

plot: When a lawyer finds herself the target of ex-KGB agents, it is up to one lone cop to keep them both alive.

plot: 1971. A nation stands divided over the escalating war in Vietnam. Thousands of young Americans lie dead on foreign soil. And at Fort Polk, Louisiana, thousands more prepare to join them. But each man deals with this prospect in his own way. One man's defiance, however, galvanizes every member of the platoon.â€?Â More

title: North
plot: North (Elijah Wood) is a talented and bright kid, but his mom (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) and dad (Jason Alexander) are utterly preoccupied with other things in their lives, leaving him largely ignored. plot: Mafioso Tommy (Joe Pesci) is transporting eight severed heads of recently executed rival mobsters to San Diego. plot: Anne Marie, a surfer girl, prepares for Pipe Masters, a surfing competition. However, she begins to get distracted when she meets Matt Tollman, a football player, and finds herself drawn towards him.

title: Pieces of April

plot: When locals make fun of him, an old fisherman vows to catch a legendary fish. He sets out on a fierce journey into the sea to prove his worth.

Offered no help by the police, Bob and Jill hunt for their daughter as they try to understand the information that they have.â€?Â More

plot: Hideously burnt after an attack, a mentally unstable scientist stretches his invention of the synthetic skin to the limit; taking on faces of other people to take revenge.

plot: Opera-loving European Brian Fitzgerald (Klaus Kinski) lives in a small Peruvian city. plot: This documentary about the world's funniest dirty joke features over 100 stand-up and performing comedians discussing and telling the joke. plot: Based on the novel by Bret Easton Ellis, "Rules" centers around Partrick Bateman's younger brother and his college friends bizarre mating rituals that mix sex, drugs, music and mayhem in a kaleidoscopic story about three students entangled in a curiously surreal romantic triangle...

title: Br√ºno
plot: Bruno, a gay Austrian fashion guru is accomplished with his own TV show, Funkyzeit. All hell breaks loose when he degrades himself in front of his fan base. He then decides to move to USA with Lutz.

plot: John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd are gangsters who have terrorised the city. Federal agents try their best to nab them.

plot: Just to obtain a green card to hold onto his job, George, a Frenchman gets into a sham marriage with Bronte, a New Yorker.  However, the charade eventually becomes reality.

With the gang divided into two factions, Shaun sides with Combo and, unfortunately, finds in him a father figure.â€?Â More

plot: Khaila Richards (Halle Berry), a crack-addicted single mother, accidentally leaves her baby in a dumpster while high and returns the next day in a panic to find he is missing. Years later, Khaila has gone through rehab and holds a steady job. After learning that her child is still alive, she challenges Margaret for the custody.â€?Â More

plot: Elektra, a warrior, faces a life-threatening situation. Post that, she decides to work as an assassin. When she is tasked to kill an innocent man and his daughter, she decides to protect them instead.

With the help of his cocky nerd pal, Troy (Chris Owen), and a supportive teacher (Rita Moreno), Angus makes a bid to turn the tables on his rival.â€?Â More

plot: The island community of Amity is terrorised by shark attacks when a vengeful shark returns to avenge the death of her progeny.

plot: Craig (Ice Cube) bails his friend out of trouble, survives a climatic confrontation with Debo, the neighborhood bully, and ends up with the girl. However, Craig soon learns that trouble can find you no matter where you live.â€?Â More

plot: A shifty magician decides to squeal on his own mob. But, before he heads off for protective custody, he decides to go to a casino for one last good time, drawing a crowd of assassins.

plot: Eleven human beings, who are all connected, converge to create a tale of love, heartbreak, forgiveness, acceptance and hope.

Eve, though, manages to find some solace with her quirky psychic aunt, Mozelle (Debbi Morgan).â€?Â More

plot: George Khan, a Pakistani, is married to Ella Khan, a quintessential British woman. He faces a constant battle to inculcate in his six children traditional Pakistani Muslim values.

plot: A Las Vegas magician who has a clairvoyant ability is requested by FBI agents to employ his capability to thwart a nuclear terrorist attack minutes before it is supposed to take place.

plot: Preppie graduates (Josh Hamilton, Olivia d'Abo, Carlos Jacott) face their first year out of college and reminisce about student life.

In a very dangerous neighborhood, they witness a murder by a gang leader called Fallon (Denis Leary). They flee, but Fallon now wants them hunted down and and eliminated.â€?Â More

plot: A UFO captained by a cat-like extraterrestrial (Ronnie Schell) is intercepted by the U.S. Military. The spacecraft's feline pilot, who goes by the human name Jake, reveals to his captors that he must locate a substance called "Org 12" to restore his battered spacecraft and reunite with his mothership. With help from scientist Frank Wilson (Ken Berry), Jake figures out the Earth equivalent of Org 12 -- gold -- and then activates his collar's technological capabilities to help retrieve it.â€?Â More

title: Fame
plot: Four teenagers must prove their mettle as they begin their journey at the New York High School of Performing Arts.

title: Fast and the Furious: Tokyo Drift, The
Mad Love

plot: A bloodthirsty hoodlum (Tadanobu Asano) sparks a series of violent reprisals after his boss is apparently taken by a mysterious assassin (Nao Ã”mori).

title: All the King's Men

plot: After lying in a coma for a year, Michael Myers (Donald L. plot: An empty fuel tank and a flat tire lead two couples down a terror-riddled road to the House of 1000 Corpses. plot: When Tom Turner gets busted for a petty crime, he's given a chance to redeem himself. The deal? His criminal past is history if he can stay employed for a year.

plot: Earl and Hank are L.A.P.D. rejects who take up jobs as security guards. The two mismatched guards are thrown together to bust a smuggling ring.

When he catches the eye of a shopworn news director (Rene Russo) who welcomes the chance to raise her station's ratings, Louis goes to increasingly greater lengths to catch the "money shot."â€?Â More

The four storylines in the film were each shot in one take and are shown simultaneously, each taking up a quarter of the screen.â€?Â More

plot: When Zed is banished from his tribe, he teams up with Oh, a gatherer. Together they get into several adventures. Their quests land them in Sodom, where they must rescue their women from a dismal fate.

plot: After a failed suicide attempt, brilliant New York misanthrope Boris Yellnikoff (Larry David) forsakes his posh upper-class existence for meager accommodations in Chinatown. plot: A psychiatrist embarks on a nightmarish journey through New York when a student informs him of her plans to commit suicide.

title: Lovers of the Arctic Circle, The
Cannonball Run II

plot: Philo Beddoe, a bare-knuckle boxer who travels from fight to fight in a beat-up truck, accompanied by Clyde, an orangutan and his human buddy Orville.

plot: Bugsy Siegel, a notorious gangster, moves to Hollywood and gets involved with a movie star. While gambling in the Nevada desert, he gets the idea of developing a gambling haven in Las Vegas.

plot: Hal and Madge start liking each other. However, Hal's friend Alan also desires to marry Madge.

title: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad
plot: The Golden Voyage of Sinbad is a fantasy film in Dynarama released in 1973 and starring John Phillip Law as Sinbad. It includes a score by composer MiklÃ?s RÃ?zsa and is known mostly for the stop motion effects by Ray Harryhausen. Wikipedia

plot: Barney (Jeff Bridges) is a disturbed man intent on abducting a woman. plot: Amelia feels sad and lonely after her best friend moves out and her cat is diagnosed with cancer. She copes with her problems by interacting with her past lovers.

title: Mother Night

But it isn't long before his superiors start suspecting that Howard is betraying them.â€?Â More

title: Departures
plot: Daigo a cellist moves to his old hometown after he is rendered jobless due to his orchestra dissolving. He answers a classifieds ad entitled 'Departures' and finds his life changing due to his new job

title: Wood, The
plot: Three old friends -- Mike (Omar Epps), Roland (Taye Diggs) and Slim (Richard T. Jones) -- recount memories of their shared childhood in Inglewood, Calif., as they prepare for Roland's wedding to his fiancÃ©e, Lisa (LisaRaye). When the groom goes missing without a word, Mike and Slim struggle to find their nervous friend and return him to his impatient bride before the wedding begins. title: Vanity Fair
plot: The daughter of a starving English artist and a French chorus girl, Becky, is orphaned at a young age. As she leaves the academy, she resolves to conquer English society by any means possible.

plot: After his wife, Sarah (Imogen Stubbs), dies during childbirth, Jack (Richard E. Grant), an attorney, has his world thrown into a whirlwind. title: Amityville II: The Possession
plot: Soon after the Montelli family buys a house in the Long Island suburb of Amityville, unsettling events begin to occur. title: Let Me In
plot: Owen, a twelve-year-old boy, was a neglected child and a victim of bullying in school. But what happens when he befriends Abby, a young female vampire in his neighborhood?

plot: Whilst on a holiday, Ryan, his father and two of his friends embark on a dangerous but exciting adventure to save a Panda cub from ruthless poachers.

Shot as if a documentary, this film follows Ivan throughout the day as it chronicles the events leading up to the horrific incident and the bloodied, confused aftermath that followed.â€?Â More

plot: Beca, a college fresher, reluctantly joins an all-girls a cappella and later infuses freshness into their repertoire. The group then takes on a male a cappella group in a competition.

plot: Prince Rogers Nelson was an American singer, songwriter, multi-instrumentalist, record producer, and actor. He was a musical innovator and known for his eclectic work, flamboyant stage presence, extravagant dress and makeup, and wide vocal range. Wikipedia

title: Fritz the Cat
plot: In the hands of writer and director Ralph Bakshi, a popular underground comics character was the inspiration for the first X-rated animated feature in Hollywood history, over the strenuous objections of its creator, cartoonist Robert Crumb. Fritz is a feline college student of New York City in the '60s, using hippie buzzwords and fashion to score easy sex and drugs. After smoking some strong marijuana in Harlem, Fritz hallucinates and ignites a shooting incident with the police, resulting in the death of his friend Duke. Fritz flees across country in a Volkswagen Bug with a girlfriend and encounters a heroin addict biker rabbit and bomb-making terrorist radicals, obvious references to the Hell's Angels and the Black Panthers, respectively. A trippy journey through its anti-establishment times, Fritz the Cat (1972) was viewed as a must-see novelty, a radical departure from the juvenile, saccharine type of animation with which America was familiar. Nevertheless, the film was opposed by Crumb, who felt that his work had been bastardized. The film was followed by a sequel, The Nine Lives of Fritz the Cat (1974).~ Karl Williams, All Movie Guideâ€?Â More

But one of the Afghans alerts a group of Taliban fighters to the invaders, and a terrible battle ensues, in which the SEALs find themselves hopelessly outnumbered and outgunned.â€?Â More

title: Tango
plot: When Argentinean theater director Mario Suarez's (Miguel ÃÅngel SolÃ¡) wife leaves him, he concentrates on making a movie centered around the tango. plot: Bruno Stroszek (Bruno S.), a hapless busker in Berlin, falls for a prostitute (Eva Mattes) who's in trouble with local thugs. plot: An aspirant travels to New York City to become a successful dancer to prove himself to his fiance, but ends up falling in love with his dancing partner.

title: Camelot

Hoping to keep Ernie safe, his editor, Howard McDermott (Allen Goorwitz), tells him to head west. In Wyoming, Ernie strikes up a romance with bird scientist Nell Porter (Blair Brown), but as soon as he goes home, he's drawn back into city politics. With Nell about to discuss her research in Chicago, this might be the couple's last chance to reunite.â€?Â More

title: Meet Dave
plot: A spaceship, which is shaped like a human face and made up of a many miniature humanoid aliens, lands on Earth. The aliens fall in trouble when their spaceship's captain is attracted to a woman.

title: Eden Lake
plot: Jenny, a teacher, and her boyfriend, Steve, head to a lake to spend a peaceful weekend. However, a group of undisciplined teenagers irk them with their continuous pranks, ruining their weekend.

However, when old film footage and other clues hint at the presence of a supernatural force, Ellison learns that living in the house may be fatal.â€?Â More

title: Best Men
plot: Four men in a tuxedo show up at a penitentiary to meet a friend who has just been released from jail and is going straight for his wedding. En route, all five men get involved in a robbery.

title: Winter Guest, The
